update TemplateDetailSnapshot

mapper.insert: Insert into TemplateDetailSnapshot(TemplateId,ControlId, OrderNum, Name, Title, DefaultValue, ControlData) select #{snapshotId},ControlId, OrderNum, Name, Title, DefaultValue, ControlData from TemplateDetail WHERE TemplateId=#{templateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
